title: The Business Process Re-engineering (BPR) Guide
headline: Learn essential techniques and strategies in Business Process Reengineering (BPR) in this free online course.
description: This course provides an invaluable opportunity to gain insight into business process reengineering. The knowledge gained will give you the ability to shape your company's future and the competence to assist your managers in constructing the best business process change plans. By the end of this course, you will be able to keep your company's processes and operations resilient and adaptable during economic downturns.
courseDescription:
BPR seeks to help companies radically restructure their organizations by focusing on the design of their business processes. But what is a business process? A business process is a set of tasks you need to perform to achieve business goals. Business process reengineering is also known as business process redesigning or business transformation. It is the practice of rethinking and redesigning how work is done to enhance the performance of an organization.

From time to time, businesses may be required to align their goals with the environment. External regulation, or developments by competitors, will often require organizations to undertake some form of business change to respond effectively. In recent years, there have been several high-profile cases involving companies that have failed to react to external pressures and have gone out of business as a result.

This course covers many important topics, including but not limited to business process change, application of a business process reengineering plan, business process drawing apps, and many more. This course is an excellent chance for Accountants, Accounting students, Business development managers, Business Analysts, Entrepreneurs, and Finance students to learn about the whole cycle of Business process reengineering.
